name: Right Side Mirror
description: High quality OEM style racing mirror High-impact ABS shell, steel shaft and glass mirror Easy to install, bolt directly into your stock mounting point Mirrors are available in both black or with a carbon fiber look

name: Motorcycle Tire
description: Expanded size range fits a wide variety of older bikes and cruisers. Tread compound delivers excellent balance of mileage and grip. Front and rear tread patterns designed for outstanding water evacuation and wet grip. Bias-ply construction designed to deliver excellent load-carrying capacity as well as a smooth ride for maximum comfort.

name: Motorcycle Seats
description: Offers super clean, custom style with a high-rising wall that offers excellent back supportCut low to place the rider slightly lower and further back compared to stock Tapered passenger section provides a streamlined look

name: Motorcycle Handlebar
description: This motorcycle handlebar grip is compatible with Sur Ron Light Bee X and S electric dirt bike 7/8 left & 1 right grips.Left inner diameter: 22mm Right Internal Diameter: 24mm.
